name: Yogscast Garbage Collectors
description:
Game starts when it opens. (Didn't have time to make a start function.)

You drive a garbage truck and collect garbage from the neighborhood, you get $125 in total per garbage container you empty. When time runs out (after 120 sec) you give the money to a charity.

GAME JAM THEME: 

Giving

MODIFIERS:

Sips Modifier - 
Game about garbage

Brunch Club Modifier - (Did not have time to implement this)
Chris and Alastair want you to make a game for 2-4 players to play for some local coop action!
